Contact

Say Hello.

I am a young tech undergraduate having a keen interest in learning everything around. I have a strong passion for public speaking, building innovative software solutions with planning, content marketing and public relations. I have been blessed with amazing parents and an extra supportive elder brother. This website compiles my diverse experiences and ideas. Feel free to reach out to me for feedback, queries or collaborations.
